metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5453 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
A mechanism to inject static HTML into the RSS reader preview page due to a failure to escape characters sent as URL parameters for a feed's "TITLE" element. This vulnerability allows for spoofing but no scripted content can be run. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 53.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
